resources.string:
Deep link with one of the following:

 adb shell am start -a android.intent.action.VIEW -d "tannerperrien:///profile"

 adb shell am start -a android.intent.action.VIEW -d "tannerperrien:///profile/3"

 adb shell am start -a android.intent.action.VIEW -d "http://tannerperrien.com/profile"

 adb shell am start -a android.intent.action.VIEW -d "http://tannerperrien.com/settings"
